con:testCase.name: NOT OK Response_7557-KYC validation
con:testCase.con:description: create NRTP payment to validate Amount validation with error response -7557

con:config.con:query: select ORGID, CUSTOMERID,IMMEDIATE_ALLOWED, MAX_IMMEDIATE_TRX from RISK.RISK_CUSTOMER where ORGID='4201' and IMMEDIATE_ALLOWED = 'Y' and ROWNUM=1
update RISK.RISK_CUSTOMER set IMMEDIATE_ALLOWED='N' where CUSTOMERID in (${RBS_RISK_CUSTOMER#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]})

select A.CUSTOMERID,A.ACCOUNTNUMBER,A.CUSTOMERTYPE,A.CUSTBANKID,A.CURRENCY from V_AUTHORISATION A where A.ROLETYPE = 'EIER'and CUSTOMERTYPE='P' and CUSTOMERID = ${RBS_RISK_CUSTOMER#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]} and A.ACCOUNTNUMBER IN (SELECT ACCOUNTNUMBER FROM V_AUTHORISATION where ROLETYPE = 'DISP' and CUSTOMERID = ${RBS_RISK_CUSTOMER#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]}) fetch first 1 rows only

con:config.script:
def customerid = context.expand( '${RBS_RISK_CUSTOMER#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]}' ) def debitAccount = context.expand( '${Fetch Account#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/ACCOUNTNUMBER[1]}' ) def debitAcntccy = context.expand( '${Fetch Account#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CURRENCY[1]}' )
customerid= customerid.toString().replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]+","") debitAccount= debitAccount.toString().replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]+","") debitAcntccy= debitAcntccy.toString().replaceAll("[^a-zA-Z0-9]+","")
testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("customerid",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("userid",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("value2",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("agreementid",customerid) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("debitAccount",debitAccount) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Properties").setPropertyValue("debitAcntccy",debitAcntccy)

con:request.name: PaymentCreate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">\r <soapenv:Header>\r <wsc:AutHeader xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22">\r <wsc:SourceApplication>${Properties#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication>\r <wsc:DestinationApplication>PIN</wsc:DestinationApplication>\r <wsc:Function>PIN Create</wsc:Function>\r <wsc:Version>V2.0</wsc:Version>\r <wsc:ClientContext>\r <wsc:userid>${Properties#userid}</wsc:userid>\r <wsc:credentials>${Properties#credentials}</wsc:credentials>\r <wsc:channel>NBA</wsc:channel>\r <wsc:orgid>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgid>\r <wsc:orgunit>${Properties#orgid}</wsc:orgunit>\r <wsc:customerid>${Properties#customerid}</wsc:customerid>\r <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale>\r <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value1}" key="${Properties#item1}"/>\r <wsc:item value="${Properties#value4}" key="${Properties#item4}"/>\r </wsc:ClientContext>\r </wsc:AutHeader>\r </soapenv:Header>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <urn:PaymentCreateRequest xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn:paymentMessage>\r <urn1:paymentIdentification xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn2:messageIdentification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification>\r <urn2:endToEndIdentification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:endToEndIdentification>\r </urn1:paymentIdentification>\r <urn1:paymentInfo xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn3:paymentMethod xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">TRF</urn3:paymentMethod>\r <urn2:paymentTypeInformation xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">\r <urn2:instructionPriority>NORM</urn2:instructionPriority>\r <urn2:serviceLevel>NRTP</urn2:serviceLevel>\r </urn2:paymentTypeInformation>\r <urn3:requestedExecutionDate xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">${Properties#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate>\r <urn3:debtorAccount xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0">\r <urn2:identification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#debitAccount}</urn2:identification>\r <urn2:currency xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#debitAcntccy}</urn2:currency>\r </urn3:debtorAccount>\r </urn1:paymentInfo>\r <urn1:transaction xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0">\r <urn4:amount xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:instructedAmount currency="NOK" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">\r <urn2:amount>602</urn2:amount>\r </urn2:instructedAmount>\r </urn4:amount>\r <urn4:chargeBearer xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>\r <urn4:creditorAgent xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:bic xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#intCredAgentBic}</urn2:bic>\r <urn2:postalAddress xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">\r <urn2:country>${Properties#intCredAgentCountry}</urn2:country>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditorAgent>\r <urn4:creditor xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:name xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">USCred</urn2:name>\r <urn2:postalAddress xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">\r <urn2:country>${Properties#intCredAgentCountry}</urn2:country>\r <urn2:addressLine>asdfasdfs</urn2:addressLine>\r </urn2:postalAddress>\r </urn4:creditor>\r <urn4:creditorAccount xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0">\r <urn2:identification xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0">${Properties#intCreditAccount}</urn2:identification>\r </urn4:creditorAccount>\r </urn1:transaction>\r </urn:paymentMessage>\r </urn:PaymentCreateRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <ns2:PaymentCreateResponse xmlns:ns10="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns9="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentutil:v2_0" xmlns:ns8="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:nationalinformation-nor:v2_0" xmlns:ns7="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:creditor:v2_0" xmlns:ns6="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:debtor:v2_0" xmlns:ns5="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_0" xmlns:ns4="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns:ns3="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:domain:common:v2_0" xmlns:ns2="urn:pins.payment.evry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_0" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22"> <ns3:ResponseState> <ErrorCode>6000</ErrorCode> <Severity>2</Severity> <ComponentId>111</ComponentId> <Message>Validation error</Message> <LogSequence xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <errorItem key="7557" value="Customer blocked for immediate payment"/> <errorItem key="6497" value="Register amount limit exceeded"/> </ns3:ResponseState> </ns2:PaymentCreateResponse> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: update RISK.RISK_CUSTOMER set IMMEDIATE_ALLOWED='Y' where CUSTOMERID in (${RBS_RISK_CUSTOMER#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/CUSTOMERID[1]})
